summary: An elderly curmudgeon lets out a room in his large apartment rent-free to a young student - on condition that she does everything in her power to ruin his son's marriage.
cast: Claude Brasseur|Guillaume de Tonquédec|Noémie Schmidt|Frédérique Bel|Thomas Solivérès|Valérie Kéruzoré|Antoine Glemain|Grégori Baquet|Anne Loiret|Nicolas Guillot|Paula Brunet-Sancho|Agnès Pichois|Céline Esperin|Guillaume Watrinet|Stéphan Wojtowicz|Pierre Cassignard|Candice Ford|Jonathan Louis|Oudesh Rughooputh|Marion Sedlak|Aleksandra Yermak
title: El sr. Henri comparte piso
